name: Metal Victorian Doll Bed Blythe Playscale Antique Style
description:
A charming addition to your doll collection! Antique styled miniature doll bed, in our Victorian style. So authentic, heirloom quality, looks like it was just pulled out of a turn of the century house! Two level headboard and footboard with decorative knobs. Just right for Barbie, Blythe, Pullip, or other 11 1/2 inch dolls. 

 Bed can be shipped paint free for that natural antique look (see first two pictures) or custom paint colors can be added. Bed colors can look brand new or be "antiqued". When ordering please choose a color and finish from those listed, or if you want something different choose 'other' and please specify. 

Bed measures 13" long by 7 " wide. Headboard is 7 1/2" from the floor and the footboard is 5 1/2" tall.

Tiny angle iron rails are ready for a mattress and bedding. All bedding shown is sold separately.

name: Playscale Metal Doll Bed Metal Vintage Retro Style
description:
A life-like miniature, our metal doll bed gives your doll house a completely authentic look! Made of steel and welded together by hand, this retro inspired bed is sure to please every doll collector. Just right for Barbie, Blythe dolls or other 11 1/2 inch dolls.

Bed can be ordered paint free for an antique iron look, or custom paint colors can be added at no charge. We specialize in painting the distressed look to give your bed that vintage or "shabby chic " look. Bed colors can look brand new or be "antiqued". Please specify color finish when you order.

Thanks for visiting our shop!

Mattress and bedding items are not included but can be purchased separately from this shop.

Width: 7"
Length: 13"
Headboard: 6 1/2" tall Footboard: 5 1/4"

Please keep in mind that these measurements may vary slightly, as this is a handmade item, and no two are alike!

Feel free to contact us with questions or a custom request.

name: Newborn Photo Prop Bed Shabby Chic Style
description:
A perfectly adorable photo prop for newborns, infants, and toddlers. Looks and feels like a miniature antique iron bed. Welded by hand from steel, and carefully constructed, this heirloom quality peice is the perfect phography accessory. Lend an authentic touch to Victorian, Vintage, Retro, Country, Infant and Toddler photo sessions!

This is our Shabby Chic style, also see our shop for the Victorian style bed!

Bed measures approx. 20 inches long X 12 inches wide. Headboard is 14 1/2 in. tall and the footboard is 9 1/2 in. tall. Bed can be painted a custom color and finish, or left unpainted.

This is the same size as our American Girl doll beds, and a bit smaller and lighter than our larger Photo Prop bed. Please see our shop for others.

Mattress and bedding is sold separately.

(Remember, never leave infants unattended on bed!)

First two pictures credit of Inspire Portrait - http://inspireportrait.com 
Last picture credit of Cheryl Leighton Photography

name: Doll Bedding Pillow and Mattress Natural Cotton
description:
The perfect sized doll bedding to accompany our antique style metal doll beds!
1/6 scale, just right for Blythe, Barbie, and Playscale.

A soft but firm foam mattress covered in linen-textured natural cream cotton osnaburg with matching pillow. Your dolly will be extra comfy sleeping on these!

Adds a lovely shabby chic victorian look to your doll bed.

This listing includes 1 pillow and 1 mattress.

Approximate measurements:
Mattress: 12.5" x 7"
Pillow: 4.5" x 3"

Look for matching sheet and bedding sets in our shop!

name: Playscale Metal Doll Bed Shabby Chic Style
description:
Looks and feels like an old-fashioned Victorian 'iron' doll bed in miniature! Curved but square headboard and footboard have decorative knobs, and looks perfectly authentic for your dolly's room. Bed is made of steel and welded by hand. Just right for a Barbie bed, Blythe bed or other 11 1/2 inch dolls. Would look beautiful in victorian doll houses or dioramas.

Bed matches up with Playscale and 1/6th scale. A wonderful addition for your doll house furniture.

Bed can be shipped paint free for that natural antique look or custom paint colors can be added. Bed colors can look brand new or be "antiqued". When ordering please choose a color and finish from those listed, or if you want something different specify in the comments section.

Bed measures 13" long by 7 " wide. Headboard is 7 1/2" from the floor and the footboard is 5 1/2" tall.

Tiny angle iron rails are ready for a mattress and bedding. All bedding shown is sold separately. Be sure to check out our bedding options in our other listings.
